name: Empusa
description: The Empusa is a Medium monstrosity with a coppery hue and a formidable presence, known for its deadly attacks and ability to shift forms.
memorable: Notorious for its ability to ambush and manipulate, the Empusa is a dangerous foe with both magical and physical attacks.
goals: Typically seeks to surprise and overpower its enemies using speed and cunning.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other chaotic evil creatures or serve as a minion to a more powerful entity.
environment: Commonly found in dark, secluded areas where it can ambush unsuspecting travelers.
strengths: Exceptional strength and capabilities in deceit, with magical attacks that bypass resistances.
weaknesses: Relies on surprise and cunning; average Dexterity affects evasiveness.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack options with claws and kicks that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Shapechanger ability allows it to adopt various forms, enhancing its versatility in combat.
senses: It has a passive perception of 15, indicating a keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in deception and has decent perception and stealth skills.
additional_information: Ambusher trait grants advantage on surprise attack rolls.
Magical attacks allow it to overcome damage resistances.
Nimble Fighter ability enhances movement options during combat.
test_queries: coppery hued monster in dark environments
